name: a week (itch)
description:
~A WEEK~

things seem strange. you feel like something is brewing, but you don't know what quite yet. all you know, is that the technology around you has been acting more self-interested than usual these past few days.

  • three endings
  • short playtime
  • made in Twine
  • play in browser or download 

hypertext game made by alisa tarabrina for PRAX-300.  reiteration of a story written by macy burgess and alisa tarabrina.
